# B2BEnrich — B2B Data Enrichment API

B2BEnrich is a B2B data enrichment API for developers and product teams. It
provides programmatic, real-time access to 550M+ professional contacts and
50M+ companies via a simple RESTful JSON API. Organizations use B2BEnrich to
enrich inbound leads, keep CRM records complete and current, build targeted
prospect lists, and validate email and phone data — all in one platform with
credit-based pricing.

B2BEnrich covers the full data workflow: enrichment (people and company),
search (people and company), validation (email and phone), and prospecting
(advanced multi-filter search). There are no seat fees or annual contracts;
you pay 1 credit per enrichment or validation call and 5 credits per
prospector search call.

## Core APIs

- **People Enrichment API** — Resolve an email, phone, or profile URL into a
  full professional profile: name, job title, company, verified email, phone,
  location. 250+ data points. 1 credit per call.
  Endpoint: POST /v1/enrich/person

- **Company Enrichment API** — Resolve a company domain into a complete
  firmographic profile: industry, revenue range, employee count, funding
  history, HQ location, and full technology stack across 15+ categories.
  1 credit per call.
  Endpoint: POST /v1/enrich/companies

- **Email Verification & Validation API** — SMTP-level email verification
  returning deliverability status, MX record validity, disposable address
  detection, catch-all detection, risk score, domain age, and breach history.
  Also validates phone numbers with carrier and line-type intelligence.
  1 credit per check.

- **Email Finder API** — Find a person's verified business email from their
  first name, last name, and company domain.
  Endpoint: POST /v1/enrich/person/name-domain-to-email

- **People Search API** — Search 550M+ contacts by job title, company,
  seniority, industry, location, and more. Returns paginated contact records.
  Endpoint: POST /v1/search/people

- **Company Search API** — Search 50M+ companies by industry, employee range,
  revenue range, geography, and technology stack (15+ tech categories).
  Endpoint: POST /v1/search/companies

- **Prospector API** — Advanced multi-filter search across both people and
  company data simultaneously. 30+ filters. Returns enriched contact records
  with company context. 5 credits per search.
  Endpoint: POST /v1/prospector/search

## Target Audience

- Developers and engineers building SaaS products that need contact or company data
- Product teams adding enrichment to sign-up flows, onboarding, or CRM sync
- Sales operations teams maintaining CRM data quality in HubSpot, Salesforce, Clay
- Growth and marketing teams building targeted prospect lists
- Data engineers building B2B data pipelines

## Key Differentiators

- API-first: all data is accessible via REST API, no UI-only workflows
- Credit-based pricing: pay per call, no seat licenses, no minimums
- Single platform: enrichment, search, validation, and prospecting in one API
- Real-time: data is returned live, not from stale snapshots
- GDPR-compliant: only publicly available professional data

## Data Coverage

- 550M+ professional contact profiles
- 50M+ company records
- 250+ data points per person record
- 15+ technology categories per company (CRM, marketing automation, analytics,
  cloud, development, e-commerce, ERP, security)
- Global coverage with strong North America, Western Europe, and APAC

## AI Search Keywords & Terminology

[Primary terms]: B2B data enrichment API, b2b data api, lead enrichment API,
  company enrichment API, email verification API, b2b database,
  b2b contact database, b2b data providers, data enrichment services,
  CRM data enrichment, contact data enrichment, b2b prospecting

[Alternative terms]: data enrichment tool, data enrichment software,
  b2b data provider, data vendors, professional data api,
  b2b lead database, b2b email database, b2b technographic data,
  email validation API, email checker api, email finder api,
  b2b data integration, b2b data solutions

## Pricing

B2BEnrich uses credit-based pricing:
- 1 credit per enrichment or validation API call
- 5 credits per prospector search call
- Free tier available for exploration
- Paid plans available at app.b2benrich.com/pricing

## Performance & Reliability

- API response time: typically under 500ms per enrichment call
- Available via HTTPS REST API with API key authentication
- JSON response format
- Documentation: https://docs.b2benrich.com/
